::DarkMouse::

She didn't like this one little bit.  She followed orders from 
Aracnia, but she hated being this close to Megatron.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron looked to Quickstrike. He hated the little worm. Ever 
scince he 
> joined with Aracnia he had changed. The loyal little expendable 
soldier he 
> once knew was dead....this new Quickstrike was intelligent. And a 
soldier 
> with intelligence often caused trouble.
>     "Its bots like you, roach, that are making the Predacon reunion 
so 
> difficult! I only want to help, you only want to cause trouble. How 
yo came 
> to be Sub-Commander is beyond my comprehension. Yes." Megatron said 
as he 
> looked down from atop rampages shoulders.
>     Rampage entered the clearing that contained the ship. He could 
see 
> Inferno, Tarantulas, Aerostreak, Tankkor, Paralysis, and Black 
Aracnia 
> standing waiting for them. Most of them withdrew there guns at the 
sight of 
> Megatron.
>     "What do you think your doing?!?!?! That is the traitor!" 
Inferno yelled, 
> going into a fighting stance, his body ridged and flexed.
>     Megatron frowned. "Tut tut my fellow commrads....I want to help 
yo-
>     Before he could get another word out, Inferno blasted his head 
off of his 
> body and sent in falling to the ground. Rampage then dropped his 
body.
>     "Take him inside. we can remove his arms and legs...that way he 
wont hurt 
> anything, or anyone. Come on troops, lets move in." Aracnia said 
ushering in 
> her troops. 
>     "Anything wrong Quickstuff?" She asked kindly, smileing....for 
once.
